Description.Text:
Property Location
Centrally located in Lorient, Comfort Hotel Astoria Lorient is minutes from Hospital of South Brittany and Stade du Moustoir. This hotel is within close proximity of La Thalassa and City of Sailing Eric Tabarly.

Rooms
Stay in one of 34 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a Tempur-Pedic bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Stay in one of 34 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a Tempur-Pedic bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.

Centrally located in Lorient, Comfort Hotel Astoria Lorient is minutes from Hospital of South Brittany and Stade du Moustoir. This hotel is within close proximity of La Thalassa and City of Sailing Eric Tabarly.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hospital of South Brittany - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Stade du Moustoir - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
La Thalassa - 1 km / 0.6 mi
City of Sailing Eric Tabarly - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Metropolis Lanester - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Parc des Expositions Lorient - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Musee de la Compagnie des Indes - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
Val Queven Golf Club - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi
Golf de Ploemeur Ocean - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Guidel Beach - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi
Chapelle Notre Dame de la Pitie - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Port de Plaisance de Guidel - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Abbey Church of Sainte-Croix - 19.3 km / 12 mi
Les Halles Historic Marketplace - 19.3 km / 12 mi
Church of Our Lady of the Assumption - 19.4 km / 12 mi

The preferred airport for Comfort Hotel Astoria Lorient is Lorient (LRT-Lorient - South Brittany) - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Comfort Hotel Astoria is Lorient (LRT-Lorient - South Brittany) - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi.
